ygData.subject: Re: EQ - worse rpg ever?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 15/07/99 15:54:10 GMT Daylight Time, die_kluge@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 15/07/99 15:54:10 GMT Daylight Time, die_kluge@...
writes:

<< Needless to say, I won't group with him again. If there
was a way to give him a negative feedback rating, you can bet I would
have done it. We all would have done it. That way, any other
potential group could read his feedback and go, "uh, maybe not." And
he's doomed to a life of solo-ing.

my two cents. >>

But there is a way.... name him! Talk to others.... pass the word.... THAT is
how its done... the making of reputaions, good and bad! SHOUT his name and
his deed... trust me I do. [well my cleric doesn't shout, not his way...
hardly yalks unless he's known you for a looong time actually ;-)]

Lifegiver of Solusek Ro
